spec.scope: Metamodel and data categories for annotation of multilingual data

info.p: MLIF provides a generic platform for modeling, managing, describing multilingual data within various applications in the following domains: localization, translation memories, multimedia, document management. It also specifies a metamodel and a set of generic data categories, which can be complemented by adding categories from Data Category Registry (DCR) with respect to the application domain.

Similar to the Terminological markup framework (ISO 16642:2003) in terminology, MLIF introduces a metamodel in combination with chosen data categories as a mean to ensure the interoperability between several multilingual applications and corpora.
MLIF uses data categories according to ISO 12620:2009
